title: San Bernardino shooting: As it happened - BBC News
summary: at least 14 people killed in a mass shooting , more than 14 wounded .
shooting occurred at a community centre for disabled people .
police later tracked down and killed two suspects - a man and a woman .
police are concerned about the presence of bombs at the crime scenes .

documents.title: california shooting : continuing coverage on bbc.co.uk/news
text: what we know so far

documents.title: more from police in the san bernardino shooting
text: there were two people in the vehicle , now both dead , police say , a third person was running away , may or may not be involved but in custody .
the third suspect is separate from the person in custody .

documents.title: the fbi is considering terrorism as a possiblity
text: the fbi is considering terrorism as a possiblity

documents.title: there is a third suspect , fbi says
text: fbi agent says he does not know `` the disposition '' of the third suspect .

documents.title: breakingtwo suspects dead in san bernardino shooting case
text: police are still clearing the building - as one sus package is believed to be an explosive device .
two suspects dead at the scene , a man and a woman .
they were dressed in assault-style clothing - armed with assault-style rifles and handguns , says the chief of police .

documents.title: one san bernardino gunman was a fellow employee ?
text: the los angeles times and the new york times , citing unnamed law enforcement officials , say investigators believe the suspects were known to those targeted

`` investigators believe there were three gunmen and one of them had worked at the facility and recently had a dispute with fellow employees , according to law enforcement officials , '' the new york times reports , adding a witness said despite a face covering , one sounded and appeared very similar to employee who had left earlier .

documents.title: update from hospital that is treating shooting victims
text: loma linda university medical center says they received five adult patients - two critical but stable , two fair , one still being assessed .
the hospital was put on alert for an hour after a bomb threat but it has been cleared .

documents.title: `` i thought , `` oh my god , that could be gunshots , '' and i pulled over . ''
text: david danelski , a staff writer with the press enterprise , has sent his colleagues a dispatch from a neighbourhood backyard as police searched for a suspect .
more cops come and one officer starts yelling at me and pulls his pistol and he asks me what i 'm doing there .
i 'm a reporter , '' i said .
how did you end up here ? ''
the cop asks .
i just got caught up in this , '' i told him .
he said , we do n't know who 's out here .
take your camera and go . ''

text: reuters captured families as they reunited with loved ones returning from the scene of the shooting

text: returning from building under fire

documents.title: county health employees inside building when suspects open fired
text: the san bernardino county department of public health has confirmed to the ap that several of its employees were inside a social services facility when gunmen opened fire .

text: latest update from san bernardino 's police chief

text: rajini vaidyanathan
bbcrajiniv
sunset in an hr or so in # sanbernadino , if there 's another suspect on the loose , police will want to apprehend them soon says david willis .

documents.title: police now searching houses in san bernardino neighbourhood
text: aerial footage now shows police searching house by house in the neighbourhood where the vehicle was stopped .

documents.title: 'unusual ' mass shooting
text: new york times reporter laurie goodstein tweets
laurie goodstein
lauriegnyt
having worked on 5-part series on rampage killers , i find san bernardino shooting unusual : 1 ) multiple shooters 2 ) they fled

documents.title: officer injured , one suspect down and at least one 'outstanding '
text: a san bernardino police spokeswoman said an officer was injured but did not suffer life-threatening wounds after police spotted the vehicle in a nearby neighbourhood .
`` a suspect has been hit , '' she says , but it is unclear if there is still one or two suspects at large .

documents.title: california governor 'will spare no effort to bring killers to justice '
text: after the mass shooting in san bernardino , governor edmund g. brown jr. issued the following statement : '' our thoughts and prayers are with the victims ' families and everyone affected by the brutal attack .
california will spare no effort in bringing these killers to justice . ''

documents.title: shot three times , man calls family to say 'i love you '
text: despite being shot three times , kevin ortiz called his wife and father to tell them he was alive , reports the los angeles times .
ortiz was shot twice in the leg and once in the shoulder during an attack at inland regional center in san bernardino .
kevin said he had been shot three times and that he was in pain but he was all right .
then he said 'i love you ' and i said 'i love you . '

documents.title: people near standoff locked inside
text: the new york times speaks to one resident of the street where police have surrounded a dark vehicle with three armoured cars .
`` it 's two blocks from my house .
i ca n't go outside .
some guy told me , get inside , lock your doors , '' linda pevlor says .
the huffington post looks at what police ask residents to do during a manhunt .

documents.title: law enforcement helps people leave building during shooting
text: a video shared by kpcc , a local radio broadcaster , shows a number of people being led to safety by a law enforcement officer within the san bernardino building

documents.title: breakingpolice now approaching suv with shielded vehicle
text: aerial footage shows two armoured vehicles surrounding the suspected vehicle with a third vehicle - possibly for bomb retrieval - approaching

documents.title: witness reports hearing 'hundreds ' of rounds being shot
text: police were involved in a shootout with a black svu and said one suspect was down

text: police hold second news conference

big flurry of activity .
police rushing away from initial scene .

documents.title: breakingactive shooting scene in san bernardino
text: police have fired multiple times at a dark coloured svu and one suspect is down , a spokeswoman says

documents.title: breakingaerial view of potential stand off with police
text: local broadcast footage shows what appears to be a black suv with a potential suspect down with police surrounding the area .

documents.title: 'no initial indication of an islamist attack '
text: the bbc 's james cook in san bernardino says that there are no initial indications that events in the town are linked to islamist violence , but points out that the situation is still very fluid .

documents.title: in photos : out of harm 's way after the shooting
text: in photos : out of harm 's way after the shooting

documents.title: 'i 've had to make statements like this too many times '
text: throughout his presidency barack obama has often had to address the us after mass shootings .
as the years passed , his calls for stricter gun control grew louder , and pushback from his opponents grew stronger .
so how did this translate into the words he used to comfort the nation after such attacks ?
earlier this year , the bbc contrasted his language with levels of gun ownership during his terms in office .

documents.title: san bernarino shooting suspects 'still at large '
text: `` we have suspects at large but we have absolutely no idea where they are , '' san bernardino police spokeswoman vicki cervantes is quoted by reuters as saying .

documents.title: san bernardino police chief : 'these were people who came prepared '
text: comments from chief burguan , san bernadino police : `` we know a lot of people are very worried about their loved ones .
we have set up a centre where family members can go for information .
we also have a hot line number people can call if they have any info .
`` i 've heard everything from the fact that it was a meeting , to a holiday event - i dont know for sure what the case is but i know most of the victims were concentrated in one area . ''
mr burguan said he no information that children were involved and preliminary information indicates `` that these were people who came prepared '' .

documents.title: mass shooting incidents reported in 46 states in 2015
text: the washington post built a map to show incidents in which four or more people were injured or killed by gunfire in 2015 .

the author explains , the yellow circle is san bernardino ( with unconfirmed reports of the victims so far ) ; the blue circles are those in which people were killed ; outlined circles are the number injured .
there have been mass shooting incidents in 46 states and in dc florida , illinois and california have had the most incidents .
in each state , there have been at least 22 shooting incidents in which four or more people were shot .
philip bump
pbump
j.mp/1lozclq

documents.title: courts and other public facilities in san bernardino 'closed down '
text: courts and other public facilities in san bernardino 'closed down '

documents.title: suspect weapons were 'not handguns '
text: during the press conference , police said they believed the suspects were not using handgun , i.e .
short , hand-held guns but `` long guns '' .
a police spokesman refused to specify further , meaning the weapons used could be anything from a hunting rifle to assault-style weapons

documents.title: what is the inland regional center ?
text: the shooting took place at the inland regional center , one of 21 facilities set up by the state and run under contract by non-profit organizations to serve people with developmental disabilities , said nancy lungren , spokeswoman for the california department of developmental services .
according to alex vasquez , a videographer an nbc affiliate , the irc is always busy .
`` this is a center that is always full at all hours of the day , so i can just imagine there must have been a lot of people in that building .
sometimes i 've been here where the line is even outside , '' he said .
the facility offers specific programs designed for age groups : 0 to 3-years-old ; 3 to 15 ; 16 to 22 ; 23 to 59 ; and adults over 60 .

text: we have a pattern now of mass shootings in this country that has no parallel anywhere else in the world

text: the sheriff 's office has scheduled a news conference within several minutes time .

documents.title: san bernardino : a large , struggling california city
text: earlier this year , the los angeles times featured san bernardino in a lengthy article about the rise and fall of the city .
`` san bernardino , once a sturdy , middle class `` all-america city , '' is now bankrupt , the poorest city of its size in california , and a symbol of the nation 's worst urban woes . ''

documents.title: centre director believes attack was aimed at holiday gathering of county employees
text: speaking on cnn , lavinia johnson said the centre had been rented out for a county employee holiday event .
her staff began to exit when they heard a fire alarm but got an active shooter message and went back into the building and locked themselves in their offices .

documents.title: ap : several people lock themselves in
text: several people locked themselves in their offices , desperately waiting to be rescued by police , after gunfire erupted at the inland regional center , witnesses quoted by ap say .

documents.title: police advising people avoid area ; 'it 's very dangerous '
text: `` we do n't know where those shooters are , '' police sgt vicki cervantes says .
`` they are heavily armed and they are possibly wearing body armour , things of that nature .
it is not a safe area to be , it 's very dangerous .
the fewer innocent people we have in here , the better ''

text: rescue crews working at nearby intersection tend to injured

documents.title: survivor texts father : 'pray for us '
text: terry petit told reporters that his daughter works at the center , and he got a text from her saying she was hiding in the building after hearing gunshots .
petit choked back tears as he read the texts for reporters outside the center .
he said she wrote : `` people shot .
in the office waiting for cops .
pray for us .
i am locked in an office . ''

documents.title: official says shooting centred on library and conference centre
text: the president and ceo of the southern california social services centre where gunfire has erupted says the focus is on a building that houses at least 25 employees as well as a library and conference center , ap reports .

documents.title: police are searching for suspects in an suv
text: police are now searching for an suv that fled the scene of a mass shooting that left up to 20 people injured inside of a social services building in san bernadino , federal law enforcement sources told the los angeles times .
at least three suspected shooters vanished from the building after the gunfire , the source said .
police have also used a robot to detonate a sus device found on the premises , according to the sources , who requested anonymity because the investigation is active and ongoing .
police on the scene were assembling a battering ram to gain access to the building , and investigators may believe one suspect was still inside , the source said .

documents.title: national response
text: president barack obama has been briefed by homeland security adviser lisa monaco about the shooting in san bernardino and has asked to be updated on the situation as it develops , according to the white house pool report

documents.title: dozens of people evacuate with 'hands raised '
text: dozens of people with their hands raised were seen coming out of an area building and walking to a parking lot , ringed by heavily armed police , afp reports

documents.title: more than 600 people work at the shooting site
text: ktla
ktla
nearly 670 staffers provide services to 30k people at development disability center where shooting occurred ktlane.ws/1pwr4ti

a spokeswoman with the state 's department of developmental services tells the guardian newspaper in the uk that the center is one of 21 facilities in the states to support people living with autism and cerebral palsy .

documents.title: multiple police agencies have responded to the scene
text: multiple police agencies have responded to the scene

documents.title: more about san bernardino , the site of the shooting
text: san bernardino , a city of more than 200,000 , is about 50 miles east of los angeles , and the inland regional center is toward the centre of the city

documents.title: breakingabc news reports up to 12 people are dead
text: abc news is reporting that up to 12 people have been killed in a mass shooting a california community centre .

documents.title: police believe there may be up to three 'heavily armed ' suspects
text: sgt .
vicki cervantes , a spokeswoman for the san bernardino police department , is quoted by the los angeles times as saying that up to three shooters were reported inside the inland regional center .
officers are going door-to-door to secure the building .
the suspects , she said , are heavily armed and were possibly wearing body amour .
it 's a very active scene , '' cervantes said .
it 's very fluid . ''

documents.title: bomb squad investigating sus device at scene
text: cbs news
cbsnews
just in : bomb squad in the process of attempting to neutralize apparent explosive device in san bernardino , law enforcement source says .

documents.title: 'bodies on the floor '
text: marcos aguilera 's wife was in the regional centre building when the gunfire erupted .
he said a shooter entered the building next to his wife 's office and opened fire .
`` they locked themselves in her office .
they seen bodies on the floor , '' mr aguilera was quoted by kabc as saying , adding that his wife saw ambulances taking people out of the building on stretchers .

documents.title: 'any minute '
text: a spokeswoman from nearby loma linda medical center said the hospital was expecting patients
`` we 're all kind of on standby right now - it could be any minute , '' spokeswoman briana pastorino told reuters .

documents.title: security forces 'take up offensive positions '
text: the security forces are taking up offensive positions , cnn reports .

text: beatriz valenzuela
beatrizvnews
the inland regional center provides services for developmentally disable people .

documents.title: mass shooting in san bernardino , california
text: here is the bbc 's live coverage of the mass shooting incident in san bernadino , east of los angeles .
as many as 20 people are reported to have been killed , police say .
the san bernadino county sheriff said there were between one and three possible suspects .
police have urged people to avoid the area .
